title: Samsung Galaxy S23 hacked twice on first day of Pwn2Own Toronto
description: Security researchers hacked the Samsung Galaxy S23 twice during the first day of the consumer-focused Pwn2Own 2023 hacking contest in Toronto, Canada. [...]

title: Hackers backdoor Russian state, industrial orgs for data theft
description: Several state and key industrial organizations in Russia were attacked with a custom Go-based backdoor that performs data theft, likely aiding espionage operations. [...]

title: Decentralized Matrix messaging network says it has 115M users
description: The team behind the Matrix open standard and real-time communication protocol has announced the release of its second major version, bringing end-to-end encryption to group VoIP, faster loading times, and more. [...]

title: Decentralized Matrix messaging network says it now has 115M users
description: The team behind the Matrix open standard and real-time communication protocol has announced the release of its second major version, bringing end-to-end encryption to group VoIP, faster loading times, and more. [...]

title: ASVEL basketball team confirms data breach after ransomware attack
description: French professional basketball team LDLC ASVEL (ASVEL) has confirmed that data was stolen after the NoEscape ransomware gang claimed to have attacked the club. [...]

title: VMware warns admins of public exploit for vRealize RCE flaw
description: VMware warned customers on Monday that proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit code is now available for an authentication bypass flaw in vRealize Log Insight (now known as VMware Aria Operations for Logs). [...]

title: Cyberattack on health services provider impacts 5 Canadian hospitals
description: A cyberattack on shared service provider TransForm has impacted operations in five hospitals in Ontario, Canada, impacting patient care and causing appointments to be rescheduled. [...]

title: September was a record month for ransomware attacks in 2023
description: Ransomware activity in September reached unprecedented levels following a relative lull in August that was still way above regular standards for summer months. [...]
